reviewText: I really enjoyed this vampire film that's also a dark comedy. The cast is a who's who of actors that was fun to see all together in one film. There are a lot of gags with some really cool action sequences and special effects. It's also fun to see with a bunch of friends!
Very disappointing.  DVD arrived damaged and crushed and has scratches and gashes so didn't want to risk sticking it in my tv that has a Blu-ray/DVD player.
